resources.string: Hey folks! %1$s I fed one beautiful cat %2$d times!
Well, this is a game where you basically feed a cat, nothing more… Enjoy!
How to do this? You already know: just press "feed" button. If you don\'t press it the cat will die from starvation.
You can also add a widget. Do you need it? Definitely not, it\'s a widget, cmon, it\'s useless
